idea-plugin.name: Custom-icons
idea-plugin.description:
This simple plugin allows you to use customize icons in Project View. You can use a little set of embedded icons or your own. Icons will be applied based on a pattern by name, like you class contains "Repository" in it is name or your directory called docker.

Supported patterns

  • contains
  • equals
  • regex
  • extension

The plugins will be improved in case of good feedback, so please don't hesitate and star the plugin. I would really appreciate if you star the plugin. The plugin page github.

Also I would really appreciate if you contribute. Feel free to share your ideas, write code and share icons. To do that just fork the repo, add icons to resource folder and open PR.
